Galaxor stumbles back from the four shots. A panel on each side of his
torso, a gun flipping out of each and firing four shots at Abominus,
eight shots total heading for the gestalt's head.

> OOC: Oops!  Forget my post with Abominus then.  This one is the
valid one.  
> If i may give my input, Gigatron will be called Megatron here in the US.
> 
> :::Abominus:::
> 
> ::Abominus gets hit by one of the missles::
> Abominus: Grrr!
> ::He takes his gun out and fires 4 shots at Galaxor::
